text: Acácio Pereira de Mesquita (born 18 July 1909 in Porto - deceased 30 May 1945) was a Portuguese footballer who played as midfielder. == External links == * * Stats at Eu-Football Category:1909 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:FC Porto players Category:Portugal international footballers Category:Sportspeople from Porto
title: Acácio Mesquita
